{"id":953349483,"question_id":171,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1684501639,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/953349483/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Excel Sheet Column Number","memory":"8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int titleToNumber(string columnTitle) {\n        unordered_map<char,int> Map;\n        int j = 1;\n\n        for(int i=int('A');i<=int('Z');i++){\n            Map[char(i)] = j;\n            j++;\n        }\n\n        int num = 0;\n        for(int i=columnTitle.size()-1; i>=0;i--){\n            char letter = columnTitle[i];\n            num += pow(26,(columnTitle.size()-i-1))*Map[letter];\n        }\n        return num;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"excel-sheet-column-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
